content: shows spiral rib pattern the rib will move 1 st to the left on each round set up round k until 2 sts rem k2tog round 1 * k 3 p 1 repeat from * for round repeat round 1 until ready for crown k3 round repeat from * until 6 sts remain end k2tog round 5 * k 4 p2tog repeat from * for round yo k1 yo ssk k1 round 7 * k2tog k 2 p 1 repeat from * for round round 6 k round 9 * k 1 k2tog p 1 repeat 2 sts rem k2tog model c shows garter st pattern round 13 yo k1 yo ssk k3 *k2tog yo k1 p 1 round k 1 round * working decrease on k round yo ssk k3 repeat from * until 1 st remains in round k1 model d shows dot pattern round 14 k end after round 3 round 15 k1 *yo ssk k6 repeat from * round 1 * k2tog k 6 repeat from * for round until 5 sts re-main k5 round 2 * p 1 k 2 p 1 k 3 repeat from * for round 16 k repeat rnds 1-16 ending with round round 8 or 16 until ready for crown shaping round 3 * k 3 k2tog k 2 repeat from * for round crown shaping options round 4 k 1 * p 1 k 2 repeat from * end k 1 after middle section is complete choose round 5 * k2tog k 4 repeat from * for round crown shaping section below round 6 * p 1 k 1 p 1 k 2 repeat from * for designer note round sizes 2 and 4 will have some decrease rnds that will end with an incomplete patt repeat do round 7 * k 2 k2tog k 1 repeat from * for round as much of the repeat as possible hats for the whole family round 2 and all even rnds k or p sts as est round 8 * k 1 p 1 repeat from * for round round 3 * p 1 k 2 p2tog k 2
